# Mashup Discovery Tool

This is a self-hosted web application for discovering mashup ideas by finding songs with matching BPM and key signatures.

## Project Features
- Dual-panel search interface for songs and artists
- Real-time filtering by BPM and key matching
- YouTube integration for instrumental and acapella versions
- Responsive web design for easy self-hosting
- Music database integration for accurate metadata

## Tech Stack
- Next.js for self-hosting capabilities
- React for component-based UI
- Music APIs for song metadata
- YouTube API for video integration
- Tailwind CSS for responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on clean, maintainable code
- Ensure responsive design for all screen sizes
- Implement proper error handling for API calls
- Follow accessibility best practices
- Optimize for self-hosting deployment
